TEXT.TITLE: TRUSTCORP INC <TTCO> 1ST QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 67 cts vs 62 cts Net 9,160,000 vs 7,722,000 Assets 4.5 billion vs four billion Note: Shr and net data are before accounting change announced in 1986, which added 30 cts a share to year-ago 1st qtr results. Reuter
